backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, access control, user/pond/post/ribbit maps, activity tracking, tag stats, and type definitions for core data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Describes evidence for a UI feature change affecting mobile Join Pond button placement, listing impacted files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for multiple frontend files describing their structure, UI behavior, and layout details.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file setting up the root mount point and loading the main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all app pages and wraps the app in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component using useBookmarks hook with customizable colors and click handling.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Renders a comment with avatar, username, timestamp, content, and optional like/reply actions.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Displays emoji reaction buttons with counts, hover effects, and a callback for selecting reactions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and a caffeine.ai attribution line.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with search UI, mobile menu, create dropdown, and user avatar handling including search behavior and dropdown logic.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout component with header, footer, and mobile sidebar drawer, closing the drawer on route changes.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar showing navigation links and recent activity, with route-based highlighting and optional mobile drawer mode.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Card displaying a lily post with avatar, metadata, image, and interactive like/share/bookmark controls.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Image frame that preserves a 4:3 aspect ratio and adds a blurred backdrop for non‑4:3 images.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile drawer wrapper for the left sidebar with scrim overlay and body scroll locking.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Sidebar showing pond details, moderators, stats, and join/leave controls with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Join button for pond cards handling join actions and disabling when already a member.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Mobile header for a pond page showing banner, profile image, details, and feed/about tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with votes, metadata, preview content, optional image, tag, and comment/view counts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user’s comment with avatar, timestamp, content, and link to the related lily.
Provides a popover emoji picker that calls a callback when an emoji is selected.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Shows a threaded ribbit with avatar, content, likes, replies, and supports creating nested replies.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Lazily loads an avatar image with a blurred placeholder and supports avatar or plain img rendering modes.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Displays trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts using fetched data with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Mobile search modal showing trending terms or suggestions based on query, with selection and submit handlers.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Dropdown under search bar displaying trending searches or query-based suggestions for selection.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Shows top, trending, and newest tags using reusable tag stats modules with loading states.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides styled tab list and trigger components for underline-style tab navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs in localStorage with helpers to toggle, add, remove, clear, and read bookmarks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, handling auth client creation, login, identity load, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a given media query matches using window.matchMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for ponds, posts, user data, and mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables for theming, plus utility classes for UI styling and behaviors.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into short k/M/B notation with rounding.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Validates, resizes, and compresses images client‑side, skipping animated GIFs and returning compression results.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Provides alphanumeric validation, normalization, and error messages for pond names.
frontend/src/lib/pondRank.ts: Sorts ponds by lilyCount, memberCount, and name, returning a map of pond names to ranks.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily URL using Web Share API with clipboard fallbacks and toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes alphanumeric tags and returns user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages user identity, Froggy Phrase storage, and settings backup via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Implements per‑lily cooldown tracking in localStorage to limit view count increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with app description, features, and community guidelines.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Displays all ponds with ranking, join controls, and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Provides a form to create a lily with text, image, or link, including tag suggestions, validation, image compression, and pond selection.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Implements a pond creation form with name validation, descriptions, and compressed banner/profile image uploads.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Allows creating a post of type text, image, or link with pond selection, optional tag, image compression, and submission handling.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user profile with avatar, stats, and tabs showing the user's posts and comments, with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the main feed of lilies with trending/new sorting, search results handling, and sidebars for navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily post with comments, likes, views, and interaction handlers including ribbit creation and view count incrementing.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows detailed information about a pond, including moderators, visibility, description, and join/leave actions.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Renders a pond’s feed with its lilies, banners, and navigation, supporting loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Displays an individual post with its content, image, metadata, threaded comments, and comment creation.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies with loading states and removal options.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Shows top, trending, and newest tags with stats and navigation to individual tag pages.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Displays lilies associated with a tag, handling canonical tag redirects and sorting options, with sidebars and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Provides user profile settings including username changes, avatar uploads, froggy phrase management, pond membership actions, and admin tools.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins for the project UI.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, and pending tasks related to correcting pond creation behavior and mobile UI adjustments.
